飯.definition: cooked rice; CL:碗[wan3]; meal; CL:頓|顿[dun4]; (loanword) fan; devotee

飯島柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Ijima's leaf warbler (Phylloscopus ijimae)

飯廳.definition: dining room; dining hall; mess hall

飯後一支煙，賽過活神仙.pinyin: fan4 hou4 yi1 zhi1 yan1 , sai4 guo4 huo2 shen2 xian1
飯後一支煙，賽過活神仙.definition: have a smoke after each meal and you will surpass the immortals (proverb)

飯後服用.definition: post cibum (pharm.); to take (medicine) after a meal

飯後百步走，活到九十九.pinyin: fan4 hou4 bai3 bu4 zou3 , huo2 dao4 jiu3 shi2 jiu3
飯後百步走，活到九十九.definition: walk a hundred steps after each meal and you will live a long life (proverb)

飯托.definition: person hired to lure customers to a restaurant

飯桶.definition: rice tub (from which cooked rice or other food is served); (fig.) fathead; a good-for-nothing

飯碗.definition: rice bowl; fig. livelihood; job; way of making a living

飯糗茹草.definition: lit. to live on dry provisions and wild herbs (idiom); fig. to live in abject poverty

飯糰.definition: rice ball (steamed rice formed into a ball and stuffed with various fillings); onigiri (Japanese-style rice ball)

飯量.definition: amount of food one eats; portion size

飯館兒.definition: erhua variant of 飯館|饭馆[fan4 guan3]
